abstract: Wall Street held on to its gains after a private survey showed the American manufacturing industry growing.
snippet: Wall Street held on to its gains after a private survey showed the American manufacturing industry growing.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Monday on stronger-than-forecast growth in manufacturing, sending the Dow Jones industrial average to its highest level since December 2007.

headline.main: Major Indexes Rise on Manufacturing Data
headline.print_headline: Major Indexes Rise On Manufacturing Data
